title: Halloween Skins
body: So do the Halloween skins like headless hecarim, and kitty kat katarina come out every halloween or just the once?

replies.body: They're legacy skins, so they do make an appearance in the store again!
Is Headmistress Fiora also a legendary skin that may make an appearance around Halloween (2015)?
Headmistress Fiora is a Halloween Legacy skin (it's not legendary though), so it will very likely come back for Halloween.

thank you, i meant legacy and typed legendary (got that legendary stuck in my head i guess). That's great, i appreciate the info. 
{{champion:114}}
Until now they have come back on every Harrowing
